bankruptcy. Chrysler sold 1.52 million cars in 2010, helping it to boost its market share in the vital domestic US market to 9.2 per cent, from 8.8 per cent the year before. It can be safely said that what Chrysler delivered last year, on both the product and financial fronts, surpassed many expectations, chief executive Sergio Marchionne said.
